remarks: Remove dependency on ~ ax-13 , ~ ax-ext , ~ df-cleq and ~ df-clel from ~ axsep2 while shortening its proof.  Remark: the comment in ~ zfauscl is misleading: the essential use of ~ ax-ext is the one via ~ eleq2 and not the one via ~ vtocl , since the latter can be proved without ~ ax-ext (see ~ bj-vtocl ).  (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-axsep2 $p |- E. y A. x ( x e. y <-> ( x e. z /\ ph ) ) $.
$d ph y $.
$d x y z $.
